description:
This PR adds an answer test for running Rockstar through yt in the conventional way (outside of the ``HaloCatalog``).  This also adds some testing functions analogous to ``require_ds`` and ``can_run_dis`` for simulation time series.  Thanks to @xarthisius for his suggestions of how to spawn parallel processes in a test.

Update 1: tests added for all the supported halo finders using the HaloCatalog.

Update 2: fixed some path issues and allowed ``FieldValuesTest`` to work with particle fields.  I now only get errors that results don't exist to compare to.
title: Adding answer tests for halo finders.

content.raw: I'd prefer to wait until Kacper can generate new answers.  Having the tests be reported as failures makes it difficult for everyone to quickly see which PRs are ok to merge.

content.raw: Those tests won't be run (thus won't break anything) until I create I dedicated job for them. However this PR seems to break *virial_radius* in unit tests, `test_fields.py` to be specific. @yt-fido will probably report this in few minutes
